summary:
Translating Dutch to English, English editing and copywriting, as well as coaching senior staff to improve international English proficiency. Clients include international businesses and government/NGOs, as well as academic and research organisations. 

Personal:Active senior, juggling life and work and trying to keep fit at the same time.  

Goal: to keep on learning!
